metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010275 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: helm Before 2.7.2 is affected by: CWE-295: Improper Certificate Validation. The impact is: Unauthorized clients could connect to the server because self-signed client certs were aloowed. The component is: helm (many files updated, see https://github.com/helm/helm/pull/3152/files/1096813bf9a425e2aa4ac755b6c991b626dfab50). The attack vector is: A malicious client could connect to the server over the network. The fixed version is: 2.7.2.

criterions.comment: helm package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
